title: ➤Classic 1 Bed Apartment in Brighton! H+HW Included! Avail. Now!
map_address: Chiswick Rd near Chestnut Hill Ave
posting_body: Charming 1 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment in Brighton is now available!
Steps from public transit, easily get to Cleveland Circle or Packard's Corner, where there are tons of restaurants and shops!
Take the T into Boston University or Kenmore Square!
Available for an ASAP move-in, reach out now for more info!
Please email Terry or respond to this ad to schedule a showing and get more info on this unit and other apartment options!
Search Boston’s largest selection of apartments at https://ygl.is/terry-zhu-agent
Bus: 501 Winship St @ Union St (0.37 mi)
Bus: Green Line D Shuttle Reservoir (0.42 mi)
Bus: Green Line C Shuttle Cleveland Circle (0.37 mi)
Bus: 65 Washington St @ Snow St (0.47 mi)

Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.
Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.
All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.
Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.
Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.
